mapper.select: SELECT a.*, (SELECT name FROM sys_admin_structure b WHERE b.id=a.structure_id) AS sname, (SELECT name FROM sys_admin_post c WHERE c.id=a.post_id) AS pname FROM sys_admin_user a

select t1.* , (select t2.title FROM sys_admin_access t3,sys_admin_group t2 where t3.group_id = t2.id and t3.user_id=t1.id) as groupName, (select t2.id FROM sys_admin_access t3,sys_admin_group t2 where t3.group_id = t2.id and t3.user_id=t1.id) as groupId from sys_admin_user t1 where t1.id=#{userId}
